channel.title: Vitality Records Podcast
channel.description: Welcome to the Vitality Records podcast! A weekly podcast featuring ~30 minutes of the best drum & bass releases from us and others!
channel.copyright: All rights belong to their respective owners.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to the Vitality Records podcast! A weekly podcast featuring ~30 minutes of the best drum & bass releases from us and others!
channel.itunes:author: Vitality Records
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to the Vitality Records podcast! A weekly podcast featuring ~30 minutes of the best drum & bass releases from us and others!

item.title: Vitality Records Podcast - Episode 1
item.itunes:author: Vitality Records
item.itunes:subtitle: Vitality Records Podcast - Episode 1
item.description:
Welcome to the Vitality Records Podcast!
-Tracklist-
1. AVA - Serene [Vitality Records] 2. Deccies - Morph [Deccies] 3. The Prototypes - Pop It Off (feat. Mad Hed City) [Viper Recordings] 4. AVA - Everlasting [Vitality Records] 5. Ownglow - All Black [Hospital Records] 6. AVA - Existential [AVA] 7. Botnek & I See Monstas - Deeper Love [Monstercat]
Thanks for tuning in to this week's podcast! See you next week!
